about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Empowering Dental Professionals
about.body: We are a specialized platform that supports dentists in delivering high-quality care by providing integrated solutions, essential resources, and professional connections for efficient and flexible practice.
about.body2: At Ouzoun, Our mission is to promote optimal oral health and create lasting, confident smiles
